content: my little toads have such soulful eyes it occurred to me that they might make the cutest little lovesick pierrot clowns pining for your love so i designed a little clown hat and collar for them just in time for valentine s day i would also like to thank you all for the continuing support of my little toad pattern it has just meant the world to me that so many of you have enjoyed making my pattern and have sent me such lovely comments so this is another free pattern meant as a gift and a big thank you and to wish you all a happy happy valentine s day too *note the clown hat and collar also look so cute on my lady spinderella doll pattern as well lady spinderella pattern can be found here - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lady-spinderella-doll toad pattern can be found here - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/toad-familiar-2 note the toad i made to model the clown hat and collar is made from my toad pattern but i ve adjusted a couple of things from the original pattern to make the toad a bit smaller i use 2 mm needles instead of 2 5 mm and use 16 mm safety eyes instead of 14 mm and i don t do the eye folds when putting the toad together for further details on how to make this toad you can check out my projects page here - https //www ravelry com/projects/magewoodwhimsies/toad-familiar-17
